ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and welcome :) Do you have any of your stories online? ... __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Yahoo! Mail Address AutoComplete - You start.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and welcome :)
Do you have any of your stories online?

--- Rangeress Starnyte <rainjastar@...> wrote:

> Hi, I am new to this list and just want to make an
> introduction of myself.
>
> Gamer self:
> My main character is Starnyte Moonlyte. She is a
> lvl
> 60 woodelf ranger and only about 30% away from
> hitting
> level 61. She resides on the Tunare server and is a
> member of the guild Infinite Storm.
> (working on a character story for her... its a long
> one and consists of close to 4 chapters now. Can't
> seem to condense it very well. To much of a story
> teller in me to make anything to short)
> I have 3 others that I play as often as I can when
> there is nothing to do on my main and a few others
> that have just seem to be hybernating. All 8 slots
> filled for my server. Alt mains (as I call them):
> Yissia Hissnpounce - 27 Berserker
> Starnova Daemonhart - 29 Wizard
> Kairii Ragingfire - 25 monk
>
>
> Real self
> My name is Celena but friends call me Lena. I live
> in
> Virginia Beach, VA and am a 21 year old female.
> Still
> in college slowly working to my associates for
> Network
> Engineering.
> I have been into gaming since I was about 6 years
> old.
> My dad then bought me and my brother (then 3) a
> Nintendo System. Whoo.. we were so happy but what
> child probably wasn't to have one of those back
> then.
> I could never really pass a normal RPG game. Came
> close to beating Mario 3 before but never succeeded.
>
> I used to just give up on them. I have played games
> from many systems including your table-top dice
> games.
> When my dad got me my computer at age 14 I became
> more glued to PC games. Never had an online game
> until after high school. I constantly saw EQ on the
> shelf in many stores and one of my friends noticed
> me
> always looking at the game everytime we went to
> stores. So xmas of 2001 I ended up with EQ trilogy
> and Luclin. Been playing since May of 2002 (had to
> upgrade system before I could play).
>
> Now I am gonna stop blabbing and again say hello
> again
> to allof you out there.
>
> Lena
>
>
> =====
> "Yes, I am a ranger"
> "Good. I have a task for you" *whispers to the elf*
> "You want me to be WHAT!!!!"
> *The Dwarf nods*
> "Thats suicide!"
> "No I will not be your bait to that dreadful dragon!
> Find someone else. Like maybe a human monk."
> "But we heard Dragons prefer the fear of a ranger.
> Especially an elven rangeress."
> *Huntress Starnyte storms away from the village
> muttering foul words in the Feir'Dal language*
> "Dwarves are only good to be food to the lizardmen,
> not party members."
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> __________________________________
> Do you Yahoo!?
> New and Improved Yahoo! Mail - 100MB free storage!
> http://promotions.yahoo.com/new_mail
>
>
